summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Fysiotherapie Cashflow webapp. Backend API working excellently (91.7% success rate) with all CRUD operations, cashflow calculations, and transaction categories functioning correctly. Frontend working perfectly (100% success rate) with modern UI, real-time updates, form validation, and seamless backend integration. All core features tested and working as expected.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 500 instead of 404 for non-existent transaction
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - doesn't affect functionality, just error code consistency

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 500 instead of 422 for invalid date format
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - doesn't affect functionality, just error code consistency

passed_tests: Transaction creation for all categories (zorgverzekeraar, particulier, fysiofitness, orthomoleculair, credit_declaratie, creditfactuur)
Transaction creation for all types (income, expense, credit, correction)
Transaction retrieval with filtering (category, type, date range)
Cashflow cards display (today cashflow, income, expenses, total transactions)
Form field validation (required fields, amount validation)
Category dropdown updates based on transaction type
Optional fields functionality (patient name, invoice number, notes)
action_item_for_E1: Minor backend error handling improvements: Update error responses to return proper HTTP status codes (404 for not found, 422 for validation errors) instead of 500. This is a low priority enhancement as all functionality works correctly.
